ygData.subject: Re: Post Patch Procing -Gordon answers
ygData.msgSnippet: Abashi Station Member   posted 01-21-2000 03:40 PM ... reduced the number of procs a weapon does while singing songs. Bards have gone from several procs per
ygData.messageBody:
Abashi
Station Member posted 01-21-2000 03:40 PM
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
>>>A major bug was introduced with the last patch which SIGNIFICANTLY
reduced the number of procs a weapon does while singing songs. Bards have
gone from several procs per fight to no procs FOR HOURS please look into
this as soon as possible. This occurs with all weapons not just Yaks. There
is a major buzz on the Bard forum about this bug!. Thanks!

This was an unintentional bug introduced by the addition of code structures
related to casting times on some activatable items. It's fixed on test and
will make the live servers at the next patch. We apologize for the
inconvenience.

-Gordon

=============================================


At 10:18 AM 1/21/00 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>
>I'm not too concerned yet, but did anyone else playing last night notice a
>staggering drop in the number of procs that their weapons are firing? I was
>fighting Ogre Bouncers inside Oggok last night with my Ykesha and I believe
>the number of times it fired over the course of about 4 hours of play was
>either 2 or 3 - that's a very serious drop, perhaps an order of magnitude.
>The last hour or so I loaded up all of my DEX equipment and played Chant of
>Battle and had a DEX of 186 and didn't proc once. After killing Bouncers I
>ran over to Cazic-Thule and beat on some lizzies and gators for testing
>purposes (also 186 DEX) and got not a single proc while there (around 20
>solo kills).
>
>Crier Sharpsong
>
>
>
